lender.loan_because: We can lend a hand.
lender.occupational_info: We like to learn math and science at school.

lender.name: Zach

lender.occupational_info:
I'm a lawyer based in the United States, primarily interested in civil work.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Trying to make as much of a difference as I can! =)
lender.occupational_info: I help my company determine if there are any licensing requirements to export something from the United States!

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: sometimes all you need is a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a fantastic outdoor clothing company that cares about the impact we have on the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I visited West Africa and discovered that I live in relative luxury even in my life as a struggling creative person. Here is a way I can make a real difference with even as little as I can afford to loan.
lender.occupational_info: I am a multi-instrumentalist and massage practitioner. I use my hands to make music and to make people's bodies sing!

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: we must help our fellow man by whatever means we have available to us.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop new and improve existing hospital services

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much and I want to teach my kids the value of helping others benefit their communities.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupation: President of a Creative, Professional Services Co.
lender.loan_because: I want to empower other women entrepreneurs to build strong, sustainable businesses and take care of their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a passionate entrepreneur who spends her days harnessing the power of the Internet to build, grow and support online businesses around the globe.

lender.name: emdasher
lender.loan_because: We're all connected, so it's critical that we help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Walt Disney Imagineering and I help design the rides for the theme parks.

lender.name: Randell
lender.loan_because: My Peace Corps service taught me the value of sharing our blessings and making the world a better place one individual at a time.

lender.name: Paraskevi
lender.loan_because: Until recently, my life has been one big financial struggle and, now that I am fiscally stable, I would like to help others achieve their goals, too!
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who treats patients with cancer. I also help them to accept their illness and deal with their health concerns psychologically and emotionally.

lender.name: Malia
lender.loan_because: It's an awesome way to empower others.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.occupation: Performing Arts Professional and Virtual Assistant

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office.

lender.name: Keldie
lender.loan_because: I believe women around the world need to be empowered to follow their dreams and make a better life for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I help manage and grow businesses by providing marketing, administration, financial, and internet support. My favorite clients are working to improve the lives of women and children through the services they provide.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to help another person reach their goals and improve their life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency department of a hospital that cares for children.

lender.name: ColleenDeniceValeriePam
lender.loan_because: We have plenty and need little, so instead of giving gifts to each other (there are 4 of us), we choose to support others in their efforts to become self-supporting.
lender.occupational_info: We sell AT&T products and services to government agencies within the State of California

lender.name: Carrie Malia
lender.loan_because: I care, it makes me happy that what is dinner and a movie to me can be part of a better life for someone else.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Nothing makes me happier than helping people do the work that makes them proud.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying law.

lender.name: Steffen
lender.loan_because: I like doing it and I belive in the concept of help yourself and you will be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I help to raise quality in adult education.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: This is the best way I've found to help people who are working hard to improve their lives and it's awesome to be able to help people all over the world. Love it! :)
lender.occupational_info: I work for an employment website.

lender.name: OnoTakashi
lender.loan_because: kivaのことは、twitterで知りました。。。kivaに関しては雑誌で存在を知っていて、twitterで手軽さなどを理解したという感じです！ http://twitter.com/OnoTakashi

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It all starts with being given a chance to make a life better.

lender.name: henry
lender.loan_because: I process loans to big corporations and businesses; why not to smaller individuals for a change....

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I'm very blessed, and want to pass the blessings along to others. There are many problems in the world I can't fix, but it's my responsibility to help where I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs and small businesses use the internet to grow and manage their business.

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their living standards in the long run. I feel that funding loans is one of the best ways to do this.

lender.name: Marissa
lender.loan_because: I believe that a loan demonstrates a faith in a borrower- that they have the power to change their lives. Empowerment leads to more global change.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a low-income community in the USA. I teach 11 and 12 year olds, because I believe that education will empower them and give them more opportunities in their future.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do

lender.name: Johann-Sebastian

lender.occupational_info: I manage a European restaurant that sells mostly organic food, bread, pastries & salads .

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Hoping to assist with giving women an opportunity to improve their quality of life by providing additional funding for their family and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Currently taking a break from working outside of home and enjoying my grand children and children.

lender.loan_because: I really do think it is one of the most sustainable answers to poverty.

lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have my education paid for, and I know that this is a true blessing. This is my way to give back.

lender.occupational_info: Companies manufacturing food products need help with new methods, solving problems and making their process more efficient. They bring me in to help figure it out.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: God told me to.

lender.name: Cecile

lender.name: Keri & Chris

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in my junior year at Indiana University Bloomington with majors in history and Italian.

lender.loan_because: God told us to take care of the orphans, widows, and those in need. And that if you do something for someone else it's as if you were doing it for Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to boys and girls that are about 14 years old

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: Do you need help with your IT? We can provide you and your staff with additional IT support as and when you need it, or we can manage every aspect of your IT for you. We do IT so well that you could let us become your outsourced IT department, leaving you to concentrate on what you do best – running your business. We can support your business during your working hours - if you work 24/7 so do we. Got an IT problem right now? Call our emergency support line 0844 848 4440 or e-mail info@littlefishsupport.com. IT Support

lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: retired teacher.

lender.name: Ronald

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: My friend Michael gave me a gift certificate, and I think this is a great thing!
lender.occupational_info: Fun! I do lots of storytimes with children, and share books with kids of all ages. I love my job.

lender.name: jennie
lender.loan_because: i like to help people in need. and i like the stories behind the person.
lender.occupational_info: i take care of peoples animals (horse mostly, cats ,dogs ect.)when they go out of town or they don't have time . i love it.

lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others we empower ourselves.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe in being a good steward of my blessings and I believe a good investment is in people.
lender.occupational_info: Communicate memories, dreams, ideas, information and (hopefully) truths into many ways.

lender.name: Minky
lender.loan_because: I know I can make my world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm planning to buy two houses and rent them out.

lender.loan_because: I want to do my bit in the war against poverty

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to succeed.

lender.name: Sarah & Charlie
lender.loan_because: microfinance is one piece of the puzzle in making the world a better place for those less fortunate, but hard working.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage positive client relationships for a large corporate law firm.

lender.name: Jonathan and Linda
lender.loan_because: We were provided opportunities that many others don't get to experience - we simply want to help others to possibly allow them to experience similar opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: We are both Chartered Accountants.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: i want to lend money to people who just need someone to give them a chance and kiva gives me the ability to do so on a global scale with accountability
lender.occupational_info: i am the assistant to a lawyer

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I want to help anyone I can succeed with their dreams and their lives! : )
lender.occupational_info: I help special needs children learn to use their voice, whether its verbally or through a device that speaks for them. Everyone deserves to be heard!

lender.name: erica
lender.loan_because: It's win-win solution to getting aid from here directly to a productive person who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I have a business that provides a narrow technical service. We make sure that people can see colors correctly on their monitors and count on having these colors print accurately on press and on their proofing systems. This is called color management.

lender.name: Romenesko Family
lender.loan_because: We as a family are very blessed & want to do what we can (even if small) to make the lives of others better.

lender.name: Westwood UMC
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves by sharing our blessings from God with those in need.

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I try to woo women through poetry

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I love Peru and helping the Peruvian people.
lender.occupational_info: Manage day airfield operations of a large municipal airport.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: It's a small world, after all.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: Rescue Helicopter Pilot

lender.name: Adele
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to make ends meet. How important it is to get just a little bit of help to keep motivated and working hard to make a living..

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to college studying theatrical lighting.

lender.name: Craig
lender.occupational_info: I work in mental health and own a small marketing and media group. I am a student of life and people. Gay and civili rights causes are special to me and matter. being a minority I like to try and help the underdog.

lender.name: Tracy and Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping other people is the most important thing we can do in this life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school English, history and social studies. My son, Gabriel, is a 7th grade student.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: Adrian Blaze
lender.loan_because: I have a very privileged life. I live in Brooklyn NY with my parents. I'm only two years old and very healthy and strong. I already have a lot of toys, etc so my uncle Steve gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birthday.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm just a toddler. I usually eat, sleep, and play all day. I have a nanny who is from Colombia who takes great care of me and who I love very much.
My mother works in international woman's health. Her organization works in Latin America. My father is an environmental sustainability consultant. They're both trying to make the world I'll inherit a better place. I guess uncle Steve is making sure I get started early as well.

lender.name: Daria
lender.loan_because: I have so much compared to so many and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work on developing and maintaining websites for non-profits. We provide "digital technologies for the greater good". It is an amazing opportunity that matches my values and lifestyle.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I respect and admire those working hard to provide a better life for their family.

lender.name: Miss Bekkee
lender.loan_because: I love people and want to see them succeed.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I once read that we should plant a tree under whose shade we will never sit. Kevin

lender.name: Kristin & TJ
lender.occupational_info: Kristin teaches secondary students history while TJ coaches University level runners.

lender.name: David and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we can and Kiva is a way to personally see where your money is going and the benefit it will provide. A very self satisfying way to use your money.
lender.occupational_info: I create Encaustic paintings (beeswax and resin) in my studio in rural Washington. When I am not doing that; I am a stay at home Dad and pet butler. I hope to use partial proceeds from my art to lend on a continuous basis.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: soy madre soltera, tengo 44 años, tres hijos, mi casa es propia en la Cual tengo una pequeña peluqueria pero no trabajo mucho ya que han puesto mas de Los Mismos negocios de peluqueria Por eso deseo Incrementar algo mas al negocio he pensado en vender refrescos,colas, jugos, helados, yogurt, etc es decir todo lo qué se refiere a Bebidas y Refrescos ya que cerca de casa no hay quien ofresca Estos servicios y más aun en las noches Uno Puede conseguirlas saliendo a las calles principales y lo que necesito es Comprar una vitrina frigorifica La Cual Tiene un costo de $ 800, esta cantidad se me hace muy duro por reunir los Gastos que tengo que CUBRIR de estudios, alimento y vestuario de mis hijos, por favor necesito de su ayuda yo devolvere el dinero que me confien a mi persona Mensualmente, por favor no lo Hagan por mi, necesito seguir dandoles el Estudio a mis hijos, gracias por su amable apoyo.
lender.occupational_info: muy bueno, soy buena en mi profesion por la experiencia que él adquiridoen el TRANSCURSO de los años pero DEBIDO a la crisis economica A nivel mundial ha Decaido bastante ya que la peluqueria y ademas una pequeña cafetería donde gente tiene otras Prioridades Por eso quiero adicionarle a mi de colas de vender refrescos y demas tambien vendería tostadas, perros de cerdo, hamburguesas y demas Piqueos, pienso que uno siempre tiene que ver Una manera de sacar sus hijos adelante una y mas Cuando una mujer hace el papel de padre y madre que no hay Darse por Vencida siempre hay algo nuevo que hacer Cuando algo ya no esta dando gracias Los Mismos resultados que antes,.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a dispenser of real hope. Its a joy to participate. And the leverage is so totally crazy.... I love that.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools and local governments acquire solar generation by connecting them to the best technology and the lowest cost financing

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to live in a world that treats all humans humanely.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: The Lord has provided.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that safety regulations are followed.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: Money needs to start from the bottom up.
lender.occupational_info: I study Feminism and Economics: women's rights in the world, and the rules of money in the market.

lender.name: Evelien
lender.loan_because: I believe that small gestures can make a big difference. I want to make a change for the better in this world, and in the spirit of Michael Jackson help those people who are worse off than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in Anthropology. Right now I am finishing my thesis on health and safety policies for female beer promoters in Cambodia and Vietnam, for which I did fieldwork last summer. After this, I hope to find a job though I am not yet sure what I want to do exactly.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: because it's unethical to not loan out a bit of disposable income to help hard working people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I run an alternative to employment for adults with autism.

lender.name: Kate
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur currently working in the healthcare sector.

lender.name: Photonics Group Ghent
lender.occupational_info: The Group has a research staff of some 35 to 50 people. We are part of IMEC and Ghent University in Belgium. We work on innovative concepts for photonic components and in particular on the compact integration of complex photonic functions.

lender.name: sanjay
lender.loan_because: i want to do work for people who are not able to get higher education , couldn't get food every time.
lender.occupational_info: by blogs

lender.name: Scot
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance. I also believe that we all need to do our part to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I build web applications for the NYU library.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: i want to help and at the same time make some cash.

lender.name: Tomoyuki
lender.loan_because: I like the philosophy of Kiva.

lender.name: Stevie
lender.loan_because: i want to change lives
lender.occupational_info:
i'm a session player for an artist named Hometown Beatdown (http://www.myspace.com/hometownbeatdown) . I play guitar and bass guitar in both the secular market and in the church
get in touch! :)

lender.name: CJLX
lender.loan_because: I want to help be part of the solution.

lender.name: Marcie
lender.loan_because: I love helping others and as a start-up entrepreneur myself, I understand the importance of having working capital.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of the Brown Girl Collective, a social network for women of African descent that provides inspiration, motivation and information.

lender.name: phillip
lender.loan_because: i want to start my own bussiness from home. i am 57 and want to serve lunches and fast foods from my home to scools and workers in my earea
lender.occupational_info: i am at the moment in the hospital doing ditetics. have studied and have a certificate in courme cooking and catering.

lender.name: Lina
lender.occupational_info: I research China.

lender.name: Kirsty and Tom
lender.loan_because: We both worked in rural India and have seen the value of microcredit schemes for those struggling in agriculture.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Micro credit is the best and most effective solution to the global poverty problem we've seen in the modern age. Not only does it create and support sustainable economies in the third world, it also maximizes an individuals charity dollar, by allowing the same money to be re-lent indefinitely.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a government bureaucrat, grad student, and also a reservist in the U.S. Navy.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupational_info: Librarian

lender.name: harlinghausen
lender.loan_because: I like the idea and I have got a certifcation by facebook

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: It is an active and constructive way to bring progress to the world, that leaves power and dignity in the hands of people working for progress in their own country.
lender.occupational_info: Jason teaches world history at a secondary school.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: There are so many people out there who just need a little bit of help to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: The purpose of my life is to make a positive difference in the lives of others. This is one small way I can do that.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have the ability to help others.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: the world is a better place when we are personally invested in each other's successes
lender.occupational_info: I build partnerships and help people succeed.

lender.name: Young Helpers
lender.loan_because: We are a grade 1 and 2 Sunday School class who earned money at an All Handmade Sale at our church. We hand stamped gift tags and sold them to earn the money for lending through Kiva.

lender.name: Paulina
lender.loan_because: i like doing something nice for people. especcially for people that arnt as fortunate as us, i just like the fact that i can try to help people and try and make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: i am an 11th grade student in highschool.

lender.name: Stefano
lender.loan_because: poor people don't lack ability but opportunity!

lender.name: Hector
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way for people to get out of poverty is through creating their own wealth. Handouts are fine and often necessary, but equally important is to create a sense of pride in what one does and can do, and helping someone start or fund their business is an important way of achieving this.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who own hotels ensure that their investment is being as productive as possible. I have the same concerns for my client's investments that many of Kiva's borrowers do for the loans they have requested - make sure the business is successful enough to generate employment, pay the owners and payback the lenders.

lender.name: Jasmine
lender.loan_because: I want to help different people all over the world be successful and happy in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school in California. I hope to one day become a pediatric surgeon.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Small changes count............

lender.name: Economic Development
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others.

lender.name: Mehul
lender.loan_because: “Money never starts an idea. It is always the idea that starts the money.” -Owen Laughlin
lender.occupational_info: I believe nothing is impossible, but many things are intimidating. I strive to overcome intimidation and march forth towards my goals.

lender.name: pierre
lender.loan_because: i care
